00020 str[strlen(str)]=' ';
00021 printf("\n\nAnalysis:");
00022 while(str[i]!=NULL)
00023 {
00024 while(str[i]==' ') //To eliminate spaces
00025 i++;
00026 
00027 switch(state)
00028 {case 0: if(str[i]=='i') state=1; //if 
00029 else if(str[i]=='w') state=3; //while
00030 else if(str[i]=='d') state=8; //do
00031 else if(str[i]=='e') state=10; //else
00032 else if(str[i]=='f') state=14; //for
00033 else if(isalpha(str[i]) || str[i]=='_')
00034 {state=17;
00035 startid=i;} //identifiers
00036 else if(str[i]=='<') state=19;
00037 //relational '<' or '<='
00038  
00039 else if(str[i]=='>') state=21;
00040 //relational '>' or '>='
00041 else if(str[i]=='=') state=23;
00042 //relational '==' or assignment '='
00043 else if(isdigit(str[i]))
00044 {state=25; startcon=i;}
00045 //constant

00047 //special characters '('

00049 //special characters ')'
00050 else if(str[i]==';') state=28;
00051 //special characters ';'
00052 else if(str[i]=='+') state=29;
00053  //operator '+'
00054 else if(str[i]=='-') state=30;
00055 //operator '-'
00056 break;//States for 'if'

00058 else 
00059 { state=17;
00060  startid=i-1;
00061  i--; }
00062 break;

00188 //States for relational operator '<' & '<='

00192 printf("\n\n< : Relational operator");

00199 state=0;}

00239 printf(" : Constant");

00242 break;//State for special character '('

00246 i--;
